mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Lyle, William L.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Yellow Springs, Green Co., Ohio [Yellow Springs, Greene County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Lyle, William L. Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Intermittent fever tertian. Treatment: Sulph. [sulphur] quinine in 4 gram doses every 2 hours until 12 grams were given on the intermediate day 2 grams at 6, 12 and 6 o clock . Result: Returned to duty .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lyle, William L.
Intermittent fever tertian
Private
E
152 O Vols [152nd Ohio Volunteer Infantry]
Ohio
